name: Intelliballz
description:
Intellliballz is a cooperative Sidescroller game,  where you play two Balls, the "IntelliBallz".   It is only playable local on one system.   The goal is to help each other to solve all puzzles and reach the End of every single level.  It can't be beaten alone, so take your friends and have a good time.

___________________________________________________________________________

Intelliballz is still in early development and right now on hold. The Plan was to add more Levels with much more Features and new Co-op puzzles.
